tool_description:
Article Rewriter Pro helps you to rewrite articles within seconds. 
Multi-language supported : en,fr,ge,du,sp,tr.
title: Article Rewriter Pro API

api_list.name: Generate

required_parameters.name: article
required_parameters.default: Dedicated servers or bare metal servers are a server in itself with no server resources sharing with  other hosting account users. These servers offer a higher power and flexibility, but usually comes at a  premium cost. In such cases, you must have to research well about the dedicated hosting service providers.
